lines.text: Why, you mustn't skip breakfast. It's the most imp... important meal.
You are not fat, you are not. Honey, you're husky, you're... you're well-built, you're macho!
You're as big as an ox and no one sees you. I am the same way, I am loud and no one hears me, but when I whisper everyone looks around like something happened.
Can't you be nicer to her?
Nice? Did you hear what she said to me?
You don't have to be nice... just nicer.
